title: Blueberry cheesecake
ingredients: ['115 g (4 oz) digestive biscuits', '2 tbsp jumbo oats', '55 g (2 oz) unsalted butter, melted', '200 g (7 oz) cottage cheese', '200 g (7 oz) curd cheese', '4 tbsp fromage frais', '1 whole egg', '2 eggs, separated', '4 tsp cornflour', 'finely grated zest of 1 large lemon', '115 g (4 oz) icing sugar, sifted', '140 g (5 oz) blueberries', 'To decorate', '55 g (2 oz) blueberries', 'fresh mint leaves', '1 tbsp icing sugar, sifted']
